reviewText: Ironically watched the movie on an Air China flight from LAX to PEK days prior to a 5 day visit to Moscow.  The movie is a good into to Moscow.  The language is Russian and the subtitles are English, or so I remember.

A comedy of modern Russia mixes reality with sarcasm while Nasha Russia characters interacted and acted in the same timing and space of contemporary Moscow. A funny, sometimes rude hyperbole of surrounding the local Muscovite-authors are sure experts of.
